Summary: The UFO was Octagon Shaped. It was copper and pulsated with light. It had some long tails hanging down. I t was large.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my patio when I suddenly spotted a UFO. I t was moving along quite fast. The UFO was Octagon Shaped. It was copper and pulsated with light. It had 3-4 long tails hanging down. I called for my husband and he came out and managed to see it. We both realized it was more different than anything we have ever seen before in our entire lives! The UFO simply disappeared behind the trees.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Beaverton
There were no other sightings in Beaverton on or around July 6th 2013
